title: THIS JOURNEY IS YOURS. PACE IT, OWN IT, PROGRESS WITH PURPOSE
description: Anirudh, your thoughtful approach and deep curiosity are your greatest assets as you elevate your SAT skills. Embrace your strength in connecting ideas and understanding concepts deeply—this foundation will make complex reading passages and nonlinear math problems more approachable. Now, as you face timed drills, remember that decisiveness is a skill you can build. Trust your instincts and use each practice session to reinforce that confidence. Journaling your moments of clarity and correct answers will help you see your progress clearly. Excellence isn’t about perfection; it’s about steady, purposeful movement forward. Keep structuring your study habits with urgency and focus, knowing that your reflective nature combined with disciplined effort will propel you toward your 1590 goal. This phase is your opportunity to sharpen both your intellect and your timing—own it fully.
